When you know your money’s secure, you can shop with peace of mind – online, over the phone or anywhere!

Stay 1 step ahead of scammers with these top tips:

How to spot a fake
  • Look for spelling mistakes. Real companies will do their best to avoid spelling mistakes in emails, social media posts and SMSes. So if you see a spelling mistake, it’s best not to believe what you read.
  • Check the source. Google the name of the person or company the message is coming from. You’ll easily get a feeling if it’s trustworthy or not.
  • Only use trusted payment methods. Don’t be fooled if you’re asked to load money on a gift card or pay in crypto currency. These are 2 payment methods scammers often request.
  • Get SMS notifications from your bank. That way, you will always know when money comes off your bank account and can look into any payments that you don’t recognise.
